      y - column coordinate
      Returns:

    • ChoseWorker

      public boolean ChoseWorker​(int x, int y)
      Send a WorkerChosenClient message if the cell belongs to the current player
      Parameters:
      x - row of the chosen worker coordinate
      y - column of the chosen worker coordinate
      Returns:
      true if the cell belongs to the current workers, false instead
